A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''December 31, 2009''', at 20:04 UTC.<ref name="-2004">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "(15:04:54) <Notch> ok, the indev version works better now.. BUT.. mouse look doesn't work at all"</ref>

This version attempted to fix mouse movement code, but the problem was made worse as now the mouse does not work at all.<ref name="-2004"/>
This version therefore has no changes at all.
